title: What to do if you become AFK because of an internet outage? (getting a penalty for it)
body:
So I was wondering that if you suddenly lost internet because of a huge internet outage (like in my case where a huge chunk of Time Waners from my are ((athens)) all they way up to Niagra Falls got cut out because of high winds) what do you do when you get a penalty for something you have no control over?

Ive gotten 1 penalty for it so far but im just scared of getting my account band or something over outages I have no control over. 
Thank god I was able to give my teammates early kills so that they were able to win without me.

Idk if this is the right thread or not so sorry if this isnt the right thread to post this into.

replies.body: The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system doesn't differentiate why someone leaves a match.  This is because all leaves still cause others a negative experience regardless of intent, but also keep in mind that a penalty would occur after more than just 1 leave.  Just do your best continue to playing without leaves to complete the required games, and you'll be okay!  Let me know if that clears things up!
